divs: sighting detailsthis event is not the one i would have prefered to report but this report page does not give much leeway for much else as it is suited for one particular sighting and i wanted to report multiple sightings on almost a daily\nightly basis for the last year or two. my area where i live is a virtual hotbed for ufo sightings, we sit on lawnchairs on our front lawn at night and observe the sky and always they show up, sometimes they sit still and flash a light so bright it blinds us, this i believe is to make sure we notice as before the brightness they appear as a red light, almost looking like a distant star. after this show of light they begin to move in an upward fashion as we can clealy see them heading out of earths atmosphere and entering into space, at this time they begin looking like a satellite crossing the sky. this sort of behaviour is common, we witness it everytime we have an inkling to go out and sky watch the colours we see most are red, blue, green and white brightness, 2 nights ago we saw an orange one following a plane, this morning was the first we have seen in daylight hours which is the one i reported in the form here. most of the sightings are in the eastern sky but, they do appear in all other parts of the sky, we observe with telescope, binoculars, our naked eye and we have captured film footage of one ufo, unfortunately my friend had the camera and took the footage, they are in denial of what they witnessed but told me they will keep the footage for me so i may see it myself, when we viewed it at time of filming it looked good, when they got home with it and watched on thier tv they said it is too blurred and cant tell what it is but, its very bright and is moving. i have witnessed a dimensional door open in thin air above my roof on night, at first it was not there, it was around 10pm and i was only steps away from my front door when a bright light in the sky caught my eye, it was very bright, as quickly as i noticed it dimmed to a bright red light and then proceeded to move slowly vertically across the sky, aproximate hieght i would guess would be 1000 feet up mayb less, as it moved slowly across the redness of the light began to dim. i followed it with my eyes, i was transfixed on it, after roughly 30 to 45 seconds i noticed movement to the left, i looked, it was in view of the ufo, i could see both things in my range of vision, i was not staring at the ufo directly now, this other object that appeared was not moving, it was not an object at all. this is right out of a science fiction novel but i swear its the truth, the sky peeled back, like a blanket being pulled back as you climb into bed, stars disappeared from the night sky where this opening in thin air now appeared, like a door opening, i looked at the ufo, it was getting dimmer and dimmer and then it passed into this black hole left from this phenomena, this hole or doorway in the sky, as it disappeared from sight the sky folded back into place and the stars in that particular area of the sky reappeared. this is my most exotic sighting ever, i am in my 50's and i have been seeing ufo's for 36 years, this is my first report, it's too bad i cannot express myself better here the way i can if i told you personally, having witnessed this i firmly believe these are interdimensional beings and not extraterestrial, i witnessed a dimensional door opening above my house in thin air and this craft passed into it, i can go on and on, i have many stories of sightings but this much is good enough for now. as i said earlier, there are sightings on a nightly basis here and all you have to do is look up and be open about what you are seeing, peace out
Summary: this was just a bright whiteish in appearance, an orb
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around April 28th 2012
